name: Wrath Tale
description:
In this Game you will experience what feels to go from 0 to 100..

You will have to embrace your anger! You are a Game Developer, after some weeks of hard Crunch, you start a new day in the office and realize that they fired you! For no reason apparently..

It's time to make some destruction in revenge!

OR

This game has been created by our team of 3 rookies, our first Game Jam ever.. But here we are:

-

Producer & Designer 

David Garcia

https://instagram.com/vegangsters?igshid=YmMyMTA2M2Y=

-

Designer & Programmer

Narcis Subatella

https://www.linkedin.com/in/narcis-subatella/

-

Artist 

(Characters, environment & UI)

Erola Vilella

https://instagram.com/lalachan208?igshid=YmMyMTA2M2Y=

https://www.artstation.com/lalachan208

~
